attributes.action: Move Pakistan to Amber list immediately
attributes.additional_details:
We believe UKGovt decision to keep Pakistan on Red list is very unjust and the fact Pakistan infection rates are far better than neighbouring countries like India. 

Infact India was moved to Amber list 3 weeks ago at the time when the new delta variant showed up in India.

We believe that UK decision towards Pakistan is quite discriminatory and is nothing to do with science and data which proves favourable results for Pakistan

UK Govt should’nt using lame excuses instead should act responsibly
attributes.background: We urge UK government to move Pakistan to Amber list with an immediate effect. In the recent decision by UKGovt on the 25th, the Govt failed to act responsibly by not moving and using lame unjustified excuses.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
